content: **drops crochet beret in puddel and snow** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** one size **materials ** drops puddel from garnstudio 50 g colour no 06 light grey 50 g colour no 07 grey and use drops snow from garnstudio 50g colour no 30 baby pink drops crochet hook size 10 mm / us n/p and 6 mm / us j
